EmailTemplate.name: ASC Quote Email to Sales OPS
EmailTemplate.subject: Request to send ASC quote against Case no.: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Team,
Please send the ASC quote to the below customer
Details as below
End Customer: - Installed By: - Total number of devices: - Total Number of Server: - Model: - Additional Module if any: - Customization If any: - IXMWEB Version: - IXMWEB ASC Expired On: - Machine Key:- ASC offer should be sent to:
Contact Person Name
Contact Person Email
Please send it to the below email. Let me know if any concerns or queries you have.
